name: Luxury House Renovation
description:
Use photorealistic graphics to feel like an electrician, builder, plumber, disinfector, cleaner, interior decorator!

Check yourself out as a renovation crew of luxury houses. Paint, repair, build, arrange.

Repair mechanical defects of heating, sanitary and electrical installations.

Collect garbage, clean the stains, kill vermin, repair holes and paint in walls.

Equip your dream interior using hundreds of equipment.
Lay the wallpaper, arrange the parquet, put furniture and household appliances.

Create a luxurious dream home!
